metadata.title: CVE-2021-4235 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Due to unbounded alias chasing, a maliciously crafted YAML file can cause the system to consume significant system resources. If parsing user input, this may be used as a denial of service vector.

notes.note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: golang-github-coreos-discovery-etcd-io package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-gopkg-yaml.v3 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-yaml.v2 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
kubernetes package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
webhook package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
